subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: José Reyes is the leading base stealer in the major leagues. Yadier Molina is the stingiest full-time catcher in the National League. They will figuratively clash in a dust cloud at second base in the N.L.C.S.
snippet: José Reyes is the leading base stealer in the major leagues. Yadier Molina is the stingiest full-time catcher in the National League. They will figuratively clash in a dust cloud at second base in the N.L.C.S.
